ApprenticeshipPosting.description: Extends a job posting with apprenticeship specific metadata.

description.description: Full job description including responsibilities and qualifications.
description.title: Description

id.description: Unique identifier for the job posting.
id.title: Id

level.description: Apprenticeship level as defined by the awarding body.
level.title: Level

location.description: Primary location of the job opportunity.
location.title: Location

posted_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the job was posted.
posted_at.title: Posted At

provider.description: Training provider delivering the apprenticeship program.
provider.title: Provider

salary.description: Salary or compensation description when available.
salary.title: Salary

skills.description: Key skills or keywords associated with the job posting.
skills.title: Skills

source.description: Identifier for the system or board providing the job.
source.title: Source

standard_code.description: Standard code identifying the apprenticeship framework.
standard_code.title: Standard Code

url.description: Canonical URL to the job posting detail page.
url.title: Url

ApprenticeshipPosting.title: ApprenticeshipPosting

Course.description: Describes an educational course relevant to career development.

duration.description: Duration or time commitment summary for the course.
duration.title: Duration

location.description: Location where the course is offered, if applicable.
location.title: Location

mode.description: Delivery mode such as in-person, online, or hybrid.
mode.title: Mode

start_date.description: Start date for the next available course cohort when known.
start_date.title: Start Date

url.description: URL with detailed course information and enrollment instructions.
url.title: Url

Course.title: Course

JobPosting.description: Represents a single job posting sourced from an external provider.

description.description: Full job description including responsibilities and qualifications.
description.title: Description

id.description: Unique identifier for the job posting.
id.title: Id

location.description: Primary location of the job opportunity.
location.title: Location

posted_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the job was posted.
posted_at.title: Posted At

salary.description: Salary or compensation description when available.
salary.title: Salary

skills.description: Key skills or keywords associated with the job posting.
skills.title: Skills

source.description: Identifier for the system or board providing the job.
source.title: Source

url.description: Canonical URL to the job posting detail page.
url.title: Url

JobPosting.title: JobPosting

SearchFilters.description: Filters that can be applied to a search request.

contract.description: Preferred contract type such as permanent, temporary, or apprenticeship.
contract.title: Contract

keywords.description: Additional free-form keywords to refine the search results.
keywords.title: Keywords

level.description: Desired seniority, qualification, or apprenticeship level filter.
level.title: Level

radius.description: Search radius in kilometers from the target location.
radius.title: Radius

SearchFilters.title: SearchFilters

SearchRequest.description: Represents a structured request for discovering opportunities.

filters.description: Optional filters applied to shape the search results.

location.description: Location string to anchor the search, such as a city or postal code.
location.title: Location

query.description: Primary free-text query for the search.
query.title: Query

SearchRequest.title: SearchRequest

SourceBreakdown.description: Aggregated information about result counts per data source.

count.description: Number of results contributed by the provider.
count.title: Count

source.description: Identifier of the upstream data provider.
source.title: Source

debug.description: Optional diagnostic metadata useful for debugging searches.
debug.title: Debug

items.description: Collection of resources that satisfy the search request.
items.title: Items

source_breakdown.description: Breakdown of result counts grouped by source provider.

total.description: Total number of resources available for the provided query and filters.
